personalStatement: Driven achiever and certified Tech Junkie with an impressive homelab. Passionate cloud practitioner with experience transitioning from local services to cloud solutions. An unquenchable thirst for knowledge, a naturally curious spirit, and an overwhelming urge to tinker. Grasping new ideas and concepts quickly. Thriving under pressure and communicating clearly and effectively. Currently expanding my skills through hands.on experience with dedicated personal projects in cloud architecture and actively pursuing certifications.

professionalExperience.title: Business Ninja
responsibilities: Liaise between clients and technical staff to identify shortfalls in infrastructure and design solutions that fit the clients needs
Design and implement cloud integration solutions
Conduct Vulnerability assessments and design security plan within the NIST framework
Oversee the onboarding of new clients and manage network deployments
Resolve and escalate tickets using Atera

professionalExperience.title: Vice President of Asset Strategies
responsibilities: Investment and Divestment analysis, Leasing, Marketing, Budgeting, Oversee all projects
Lead the IT vendors in design, implementation and management of the network and cloud integration
Help desk support for staff and tenants
